meanings.sent1: She conformed to the school dress code by wearing the required uniform.
meanings.sent2: The company conformed to the industry regulations to ensure safety standards.
meanings.sent3: He conformed to the traffic rules, even when riding his bicycle in the park.
meanings.sent4: The puzzle pieces conformed perfectly, creating a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent5: The plants conformed to the shape of the garden trellis, adding a lovely touch to the backyard.

meanings.definition: Acted in accordance with prevailing customs or practices.
meanings.sent1: They conformed to the tradition of exchanging gifts during the holiday season.
meanings.sent2: The team conformed to the unwritten rule of shaking hands after a game.
meanings.sent3: The cat conformed to the household routine, always napping in the sunny spot by the window.
meanings.sent4: The waves conformed to the shore, creating a soothing rhythm along the beach.
meanings.sent5: The clouds conformed to the wind's direction, painting a beautiful sunset sky.
